Name: Dunmakia Kingdom
About the game: A mysterious book has sent Clara to another world and she must now find her way home. While Dunmakia Kingdom looks to be a calm place, powerful forces are on the move, aiming to make big changes. Explore the world and enjoy the adventure in this turn based rpg with light puzzle elements. The story has a lighthearted tone and the estimated playtime to the end is three and a half hour for the easy ending. I had a lot of fun making the game so I hope some of it rub off. Controls Arrow keys to move/select option C/Enter to confirm X/Esc to cancel/bring up game menu Press f1 for options menu and check the “smooth mode” for a better experience. ( Warning pressing f12 sends you back to the main menu directly )
